= How to configure a calendar to be the one nDoctor uses =

Go to *Application menu* => *Settings* => *Calendar*

https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-tOdYvAJQoFI/US_JZBtn8HI/AAAAAAAAAXk/im43IbZaGns/s600/1.jpg

 # Check the box _Activate Google Calendar binding?_
 # *Don't* change the value of _Binded calendar_ unless you know what you are doing!
 # Set your user name
 # Set you password. This password will be *encrypted* into a config file.
 # Save and start to use the calendar.
